create.title: Create private group
create.description: Create a new private group to chat with your friends
create.add-some-participants: Add one or more participants to the group
create.search-follows: Start typing to search your follows

type.content: Encrypted messages, only you and the recipient can read the content
type.content-many: Encrypted group messages, only members can read content

private-group.compliant: User has set up private message relays
private-group.non-compliant: User has not set up private message relays, falling back to outbox relays
